intro.title: Senior Laravel Developer
intro.description: of experience. I specialize in building
intro.tech: Laravel, Multi-Tenancy, Filament, Livewire, and modern PHP

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a senior Laravel developer specializing in building scalable, enterprise-grade web applications. With over 5 years of experience, I've architected and developed complex systems including multi-tenant SaaS platforms, e-commerce solutions, and comprehensive admin panels that serve thousands of users.
about.background: My expertise spans the entire Laravel ecosystem, from advanced multi-tenancy implementations to real-time features with WebSockets. I excel at creating robust APIs, implementing complex business logic, and optimizing application performance. My technical stack includes Laravel Filament for admin interfaces, Livewire for dynamic frontends, and modern deployment practices with Docker and cloud platforms.
about.approach: I approach each project with enterprise-level thinking, focusing on scalable architecture, security best practices, and maintainable code. Whether it's implementing multi-tenant isolation, integrating payment gateways, or building real-time collaborative features, I deliver solutions that grow with your business needs. I'm passionate about leveraging Laravel's powerful ecosystem to create applications that are both technically excellent and user-friendly.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore a diverse portfolio of Laravel applications I've built, from multi-tenant SaaS platforms to enterprise e-commerce solutions. Each project demonstrates advanced Laravel techniques, scalable architecture, and modern development practices.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platforms
ecommerce.description: Custom-built online stores with features like product catalogs, shopping carts, secure payment gateway integration (Stripe, PayPal), order management, and user accounts.

adminPanels.title: Admin Panels & Dashboards
adminPanels.description: Powerful and intuitive admin interfaces for managing application data, users, and settings. Includes features like role-based access control, data visualization, and activity logging.

saas.title: SaaS Applications
saas.description: Scalable and secure Software-as-a-Service products with features like subscription management, multi-tenancy, user onboarding, and robust back-end infrastructure.

education.title: Bachelor's Degree in Business Intelligence
education.description: Graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Business Intelligence, studying the intersection of business and information technology. Gained strong foundation in data analysis, system design, and decision support systems, with theoretical and practical knowledge in both business management and IT.

intern.title: Web Development Intern
intern.description: Completed a two-month internship focused on back-end development using PHP, CodeIgniter, and Laravel. Contributed to two real-world projects, gaining hands-on experience with frameworks, database management, and API integration while collaborating in a team environment.

freelance.title: Freelance Web Developer
freelance.description: Worked with various clients on custom websites and web applications. Built full-stack solutions using Laravel, Livewire, Alpine.js, and Tailwind CSS. Handled all project stages from requirements gathering to deployment and post-launch support, delivering business-focused solutions like inventory systems, booking tools, and dynamic dashboards.

fulltime.title: Full-Time Web Developer
fulltime.description: Joined Satoripop full-time after graduation, actively working on both new and legacy Laravel-based projects. Building advanced features using Laravel, Filament, Alpine.js, and Livewire. Improving and maintaining admin panels, internal tools, and client-facing platforms while collaborating in Agile teams and contributing to code reviews.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.

footer.builtWith: built with React & Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, three.js, Framer Motion, React Email & Resend, Vercel hosting.
